# f5distributedcloud_route (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_route` resource manages Routes in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Routes define traffic routing rules for load balancers.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_route" "example" {
  name        = "api-route"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  path        = "/api/v1/*"
  methods     = ["GET", "POST"]
  destination = "backend-pool"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `destination` (String) Destination pool or service for matched traffic.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `path` (String) URL path pattern for the route.

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `methods` (List of String) HTTP methods allowed for this route.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
